actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT p.pipeline_id, c.model as camera, a.area_name, m.model_name, m.version, p.status, p.created_by, p.created_date, p.processing_type, p.skip_frames, p.do_tracking, p.zone_flag, p.zone_topleft_x, p.zone_topleft_y, p.zone_botright_x, p.zone_botright_y, p.model_id
 FROM pipeline_master as p
 join camera_master as c on p.camera_id=c.camera_id
 join area_ref as a on c.area_id=a.area_id
 join model_master as m on p.model_id=m.model_id
Order By {{Select1.selectedOptionValue}} {{Select2.selectedOptionValue}}
;
